text: Don't Bother to Knock is a 1952 American psychological thriller movie. It was directed by Roy Ward Baker. The movie is based on the 1951 novel Mischief by Charlotte Armstrong. Actors include Marilyn Monroe, Richard Widmark, Enrique Pe√±a Nieto, Elisha Cook Jr., Anne Bancroft, and Jeanne Cagney. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950s thriller movies Category:1950s psychological movies Category:1952 movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Roy Ward Baker Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Don't Bother to Knock
